    • Method Detail

      • lookupAnnotatedElements

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.Method,​java.util.List<A>> lookupAnnotatedElements​(java.lang.Object controller)
        Description copied from class: AbstractAnnotationBasedControllerExtension
        Overriding methods need to return a map, where the key is the annotated element (e.g. field, method) and the value is a list of (potentially repeatable) annotations. In case the annotation is not repeatable, than e list with size 1 is returned, containing the single annotation.
        Specified by:
        lookupAnnotatedElements in class AbstractAnnotationBasedControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​java.lang.reflect.Method>
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller instance to extend
        Returns:
        the map of annotated elements and their corresponding annotations (potentially repeatable)

      • createValueChangeListener

        protected TimedChangeListener<java.lang.Object> createValueChangeListener​(java.lang.Object instance,
                                                                          java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                                          long timeoutMs,
                                                                          javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty listenerActionBooleanProperty)
        Creates a value change listener that invokes the supplied Method on the given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance holding the method
        method - the method to execute from the change listener
        timeoutMs - the timeout in milliseconds
        listenerActionBooleanProperty - an optional boolean property that must be set to true, so that the change listener is executed
        Returns:

      • createListChangeListener

        protected TimedListChangeListener<java.lang.Object> createListChangeListener​(java.lang.Object instance,
                                                                             java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                                             long timeoutMs,
                                                                             javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty listenerActionBooleanProperty,
                                                                             java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> allValuesSupplier,
                                                                             java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Object> singleValueSupplier)
        Creates a list change listener that invokes the supplied Method on the given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance holding the method
        method - the method to execute from the list change listener
        timeoutMs - the timeout in milliseconds
        listenerActionBooleanProperty - an optional boolean property that must be set to true, so that the change listener is executed
        allValuesSupplier - a supplier that gets all values that are selected
        singleValueSupplier - a supplier that gets a single selected value (this is usually the last selected item)
        Returns:
